Text:
You can find the second DVD here - http://thepiratebay.org/details.php?id=3439881

Must see!
Any chance of finding english subtitles for this one ?
Anyone out there that can seed this one please?

How come there is no english sbtitles !?
DVD's information on Amazon says there is !?

Here are the English Subs:
http://www.podnapisi.net/index.php/ppodnapisi/podnapis?i=189643

However, you have to be using the DVDs to make it work. Also, they are bootleg, so they aren't the greatest in the world. 

I'm going to try and release a subbed version that's accurate with .avi files, but I'm by myself doing it. So it might take forever.

All 10 parts with English subtitles here:
